article: A man with a green bag walked into a doctor's room. "Please sit down. Open your mouth and  put out  your tongue ,"the doctor said, "OK. You can  _  your mouth now. I know  _  you need. I see hundreds of people like you. None of them get any exercise. "I don't want to hear any  _  " the doctor said. "You must find time for exercise. If you don't, you will get  _  and have health problems when you are older." "But I walk every day." the man said. You  _  a few meters to the train station from your house, a few more meters from the station to your office, and a few more meters from your office to a  _  for lunch and back."
